experiment_name: Artificial Metalloenzymes based on TetR Proteins and Cu(II) for Enantioselective Friedel-Crafts Alkylation Reactions
additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:4°C;    reaction_ph:7.0;    reaction_other_conditions:500 mM NaCl, 72 hours, continuous inversion, 90 µM Cu(NO3)2 (9 mol% loading), 1.3 equivalents of protein (120 µM in protein dimer);    reaction_substrate_concentration:1 mM 1a, 1 mM 2a
